[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying an odd looking whetstone. Upon closer inspection, it appears my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has returned with the legendary Whetstone of Tudwal Tudglyd!
The Dead Sea Scrolls

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, a small wooden box. I open it, and inside there exists many texts of historical and religious importance! My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Dead Sea Scrolls!
The Grail of Baal Hammon
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying with him a goblet. As he gets closer, I realize my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Grail of Baal Hammon!
The Holy Striker
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a once broken holy sword, that has since been mended together again! My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Grail Sword!
Zulfiqar
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying the legendary sword of Ali ibn Abi Talib! My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Zulfiqar!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a small box. Upon opening it, I see that my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found a magical Adder Stone!
Magical Hamper

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a an ordinary looking wicker box. As a demonstration, he opens the wicker box and places inside an apple. When he reopens the box, the apple is increased tenfold! My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Hamper of Gwyddno Garanhir!
The Mantle of Purity
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, bringing forward the glorious Mantle of Tegau Gold-Breast!
Claidheamh Solais

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying something in a black cloth. As I pull back the cloth, a brilliant light shines out from the sword within. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Claidheamh Solais!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a large sword. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found Cruadh Chosgarach!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a large sword. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found Cosgarach Mhor!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a large sword. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the lost sword, Egeking!
Spear of Death
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a deathly spear. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found Gae Bulg, the spear of Death!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a peculiar sword. As I handle it, it begins to sing a sweet song. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Singing Sword!
The Spear of Lugh
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned carrying a large green spear. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] informs me that this is the Spear of Lugh himself!
Smith of Branches
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a ceremonial sword made out of a magical wood. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found one the old Celtic relic, Ceard nan Gallan!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying some sort of ceremonial sword. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] explains to me that he has found the lost sword Clarent!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a sinister looking ceremonial sword. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found Fragarach!
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying an object wrapped in a silk cloth. Upon unwrapping it, I see my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Bust of Nefertiti!
The Rosetta Stone
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying a stone with strange markings on it. Upon closer inspection, it seems my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Rosetta Stone!
The Death mask of Tutankhamun
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying an object wrapped in a silk cloth. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Death Mask of Tutankhamun!
The Mask of Agamemnon
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying something within a box. When I open it, I find my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has found the Mask of Agamemnon!
After a long effort we succeeded in unearthing Engraved Anglian Helmet! This is an impressive feat and will bring glory to our House.
